anomalies.reason: Multiple failed login attempts (8) from same IP within 5.2 minutes
mitigation_suggestions: Block the suspicious IP address immediately
Enable account lockout after 3 failed attempts
Alert security team and investigate the source

anomalies.reason: User switched from external to internal network (93.184.216.34 -> 10.0.0.4) within 14.0 minutes
mitigation_suggestions: Immediately suspend user account for security review
Force password reset and re-authentication
Alert security team for potential account compromise
Check for unauthorized access to user credentials

anomalies.reason: Successful login after 4 failed attempts (potential password guessing)
mitigation_suggestions: Immediately suspend the user account
Force password reset and re-authentication
Alert security team for potential account takeover
Review user's recent activity for unauthorized access
